channel.title: Posts on Large Government of Canada IT projects
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Large Government of Canada IT projects

item.title: About
item.description: Jump to the results About this data This data was collected in response to a written question in the House of Commons from May 1, 2019. The question read: Q-2460 – May 1, 2019 – Mr. Lauzon (Stormont-Dundas-South Glengarry) With regard to ongoing or planned government IT projects over $1 million: (a) what is the list of each project, including a brief description; and (b) for each project listed in (a), what is the (i) total budget, (ii) estimated completion date?

item.title: Table data
item.description: List of Government of Canada IT projects over $1 million Self-reported by departments, as of May 1, 2019. Download this data in CSV format. Department Description Total cost Estimated completion date Years remaining Privy Council Office The Secure Communications for National Leadership (SCNL), mentioned in the 2019-2020 Privy Council Office Departmental Plan is a joint Privy Council Office and Communications Security Establishment wide initiative to provide Canada's Senior Government Officials with modern and secure means of communications at the Secret level.
